name: naming-destructed-variables
description: A repository for ECMAScript proposal about naming destructed variables.

scripts.build-loose-windows: node -e "fs.mkdirSync(""build"", { recursive: true })" && ecmarkup --load-biblio @tc39/ecma262-biblio --verbose spec.emu build/index.html --lint-spec
scripts.build-loose: node -e 'fs.mkdirSync("build", { recursive: true })' && ecmarkup --load-biblio @tc39/ecma262-biblio --verbose spec.emu build/index.html --lint-spec
